name: Xanax
description: Alprazolam is a depressant substance of the benzodiazepine class. Its characteristic effects include anxiety suppression, sedation, disinhibition, and muscle relaxation.
warnings: Try to avoid alcohol. It is advised to never combine with GHB or opiods.

name: Valium
description: Diazepam (also known as Valium) is a depressant substance of the benzodiazepine class. Its mechanism of action is to increase the effects of the inhibitory neurotransmitter GABA.
warnings: Try to avoid alcohol. It is advised to never combine with GHB or opiods.

name: Rivotril
description: Clonazepam (trade name Klonopin or Rivotril) is a long-acting psychoactive substance of the benzodiazepine class which produces mainly anxiolytic, but also anticonvulsant, muscle relaxant, amnesic, sedative, depressant and hypnotic effects.
warnings: Try to avoid alcohol. It is advised to never combine with GHB or opiods.

name: Sobril
description: Oxazepam is a short-to-intermediate-acting benzodiazepine. Oxazepam is used for the treatment of anxiety, insomnia, and to control symptoms of alcohol withdrawal syndrome.
warnings: Try to avoid alcohol. It is advised to never combine with GHB or opiods.

name: Cocaine
description: Alprazolam is a depressant substance of the benzodiazepine class. Its characteristic effects include anxiety suppression, sedation, disinhibition, and muscle relaxation.
warnings: Do not exceed 6 tablets in 24 hours

name: Amphetamine
description: Alprazolam is a depressant substance of the benzodiazepine class. Its characteristic effects include anxiety suppression, sedation, disinhibition, and muscle relaxation.
warnings: Do not exceed 6 tablets in 24 hours

name: Ketamine
description: Alprazolam is a depressant substance of the benzodiazepine class. Its characteristic effects include anxiety suppression, sedation, disinhibition, and muscle relaxation.
warnings: Do not exceed 6 tablets in 24 hours
